release.action: Internationalization Choice Broken in 5.10.1
Carriage Return support in OS
Loaded Characters correctly receive level-based feats
Officially Deprecate FEAT in PCClass
Add new suite of ABILITY output tags, including a new JEP based count function for abilities.
Update output sheet FOR node to allow it to call multi parameter JEP functions.
[MSRD] Move real world animals from Creatures to Basics
Deprecate AL Token in Race LST Files
Deprecate RACENAME Token in Race LST Files
Deprecate SKILL Token in Race LST Files
Deprecate ROOT Token in Skill LST Files
MULTIPREREQs no longer ignored
HITDIE: mods in Templates no longer applied twice to SUBCLASSes
Templates once again properly applied to PlayerCharacters (broken in 5.11.1)
[RSRD] Lich Template missing +8 racial bonus to Search
[RSRD] Phrenic Creature template missing
New source [Secular Games] [ACG] Arcane Archer.
New source [Blue Devil Games] [DS] Operation Quick Launch.
Template prerequisites (no longer) prevent removal
VISION Tag now works on Class Level Lines
New Output Tag - TEXT. Used to format text output, see PCGen Documentation
Add .NOSTAR option to ARMOR.x.y.NAME tag
Fix FOR loop can only count upwards.
Companion Mod Enhancements
AUTO:WEAPONPROF for deity's favored weapon
Further work on the ability object
Version 0.001 of NPC Generator
[WotC] d20 Weapons Locker
[BFG] Masterwork Qualities
[SEP] Modern Principles
Implement Substitution Levels.
Added MANUALWHITESPACE output tag.
Clean up the pcgen/lib directory.
Update skinlf to 6.2.
Update JEP to 2.31.
Default data directory to user's home directory.
Correct the handling of accented characters in sources.
DOMAIN LST editor - Add FEAT support.
KIT Duplicate ranks added when adding a Trained Only skill.
DR tag does not work per level in Class files.
Added completed FantasyGrounds sheet.
